title: 12-Factor Agent Development
description: Master the 12 core patterns for building production-ready AI agents. Move beyond framework abstractions to create reliable, maintainable LLM applications using proven software engineering principles.
author: Brandon J. Redmond
learningOutcomes: Understand why most agents fail at the 70-80% quality mark and how to push beyond it
Master JSON extraction as the fundamental building block of agent systems
Design and implement stateless, interruptible agent architectures
Build production-ready micro-agents with clear boundaries and responsibilities
Apply software engineering principles to LLM application development
